title: United Microelectronics August Sales Rise 6.8% - Quick Facts
content:
(RTTNews.com) - Semiconductor company United Microelectronics Corp. ( UMC ) reported that unaudited net sales for the month of August 2015 grew 6.79 percent to NT$12.19 billion from last year's NT$11.42 billion.

For the January-August 2015 eight-month period, net sales amounted to NT$100.56 billion, up 11.09 percent from NT$90.52 billion in the same period last year.
